title: The Bachelorette's Georgia Love and fiancé Lee Elliott make a surprise appearance on The Block
text:
They rose to fame and fell in love on The Bachelorette back in 2016.

And on Sunday, former reality TV stars Georgia Love and fiancé Lee Elliott made a surprise appearance on The Block.

The pair bumped into contestant Deb when she went shopping for furniture at Freedom, before Deb joked: 'So you guys found love but can you renovate a house?'

'So you guys found love but can you renovate a house?' The Bachelorette's Georgia Love and fiancé Lee Elliott (pictured) made a surprise appearance on The Block on Sunday

'Maybe find out next year,' Georgia replied with a laugh.

'We had a reality TV-off,' Deb joked to camera about the run-in.

'What would be harder, The Bachelor or The Block? Definitely The Block,' Deb remarked.

Comparing the shows: 'What would be harder, The Bachelor or The Block? Definitely The Block,' Deb remarked (pictured with husband Andy)

She and husband Andy then said to camera how Georgia and Lee had it easy, when they 'drunk champagne and went on dates in helicopters' on The Bachelorette.

Deb then told the pair how The Block had been a 'roller coaster,' before journalist Georgia remarked: 'Reality TV, right?!'

Georgia and Lee rose to fame on The Bachelor back in 2016 and fell in love, with Georgia choosing him as her winner.

She's been there! Deb then told the pair how The Block had been a 'roller coaster,' before journalist Georgia remarked: 'Reality TV, right?!'

The pair are now engaged and announced their engagement in September.

'I liked it so I put a ring on it,' Lee wrote on Instagram at the time, adding the hashtag: 'Feyonce.'

Georgia meanwhile posted at the time: 'If you're not busy for the next 50 or 60 years... Yes!'
description: They rose to fame and fell in love on The Bachelorette back in 2016.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
